summary: Digital and print media professional and consultant with a strong vision to develop new projects and specialist in business development. Strong management skills and leading teams. Result oriented. Passionate and experienced in product and audience development, analytic tools, emerging technologies and their applications in the media industry. Social media and content strategist. Bilingual.

experience.title: Director of Digital Transformation / Vice President of Content
experience.description: In charge of digital and print operations; led digital transition of ImpreMedia, the leading Hispanic news and information company in the U.S. in online and print. Managed online properties and advised on audience development and digital strategy; involved in the La Nación transition as Senior Consultant.

experience.title: CEO and Owner
experience.description: International media consultancy and research company specialized in news media: new digital and business projects and how to change legacy companies to a digital environment. Served clients across Europe and Latin America.

experience.title: CEO and General Manager
experience.company: Independent consulting (news media, content, product, business development, newsroom organization and design)
experience.description: CEO and General Manager focusing on news media consultancy, content, product development, and newsroom organization.

experience.title: Managing Editor
experience.description: Managing Editor for the Madrid-based national newspaper Diario 16.

experience.title: Managing Editor and Art Director
experience.description: Managing Editor and Art Director; executive editor of the El Períodico de Catalunya's special edition during Olympic Games in Barcelona, 1992.

experience.title: Founder, Art Director and Managing Editor
experience.description: Founder, Art Director and Managing Editor of El Sol, a Spanish national newspaper.

experience.title: Reporter
experience.description: Reporter in the business newspaper Cinco Días (Madrid).

experience.title: Reporter
experience.description: Reporter for the local newspaper El Ideal Gallego (A Coruña, Spain).

education.school: El País - Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
